amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 118-12 to add plans to eliminate college credit courses to the list of required disclosures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Ms. Tenney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
